name: Getaway Car: Collect the Coins
description: Getaway Car: Collect the Coins, is a 2D maze game where the goal is collecting the coins. The players profile is a Car, a getaway car. Once all the coins  are collected, you will enter the next level. Collecting the coins is not that easy because there will be police cars who are patrolling the area and once you are caught, you are busted and the game is over.
